title: An Act allowing cities and towns the authority to issue temporary parking identification placards to the temporarily disabled

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Ayers of Quincy, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3616) of Bruce J. Ayers that cities and towns be authorized to issue temporary placards for handicapped parking spaces.  Transportation.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Transportation
Hearing scheduled for 10/21/2025 from 11:00 AM-01:00 PM in B-2

Hearing rescheduled to 10/21/2025 from 11:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2                                                                                                                                                            and Virtual Hearing location changed

Hearing rescheduled to 10/21/2025 from 11:00 AM-11:45 PM in A-2                                                                                                                                                               and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
